channel.title: Posts on Scihype
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Scihype

item.title: Welcome to the SciHype!
item.description: “The important thing in science is not so much to obtain new facts as to discover new ways of thinking about them.” William Lawrence Bragg Why SciHype? The final aim of every research is to improve people’s life. But how can we achieve it if there is no direct connection between cutting-edge scientific discoveries and people? SciHype’s goal is to bridge people with the most recent advances in the biomedical by providing a summary of the most modern observations and innovations.

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Maryna, I am a PhD candidate in single-cell multi-omics and personalised medicine in UMCG, TranSys project. Being extremely passionate about science and research, I started SciHype project in March 2020, to highlight and explain frontier research for community.
